resources.description: Expenditure on RnD in Italy, regional time series
resources.name: RnD Expenditure

organization.description: Group for Economics data especially that which is [open data](http://opendefinition.org/). This can be any kind of data related to economics from development to finance, and micro to macro. We run an open group policy so anyone can add datasets to this group but we will review datasets added to the group for quality.
organization.title: Economics Datasets
organization.name: economics

name: total-expenditure-on-research-and-development-italy
notes: The R & D is defined as "creative work undertaken systematically in order to increase the stock of knowledge (including knowledge of mankind, culture and society) and to use this knowledge to new applications". The presented indicator relates to the value of the sum of gross domestic product spent on R & D for recognized companies, public institutions and private non-profit organizations and those estimated for the universities (Source: OECD/Eurostat Manual).
title: Total Expenditure on Research and Development - Italy
